summary: A small town is haunted by the twin daughters of a wrongfully convicted man. Young Jordan is sent down the path to who the real killer is, only to find the killer is very close to her.
cast: Steve Bacic|Tara Westwood|Alix Elizabeth Gitter|James Cavlo|Nikita Ramsey|Jade Ramsey|Brandon Kelly|James Ralph|Erick Avari|James C. Burns|Derek Fergus|Mark Scoltock|Zebulun Huling
title: A Haunting at Silver Falls
